calculator

Find out how much you can borrow on your home or investment loan with Mortgageport’s handy Borrowing Power Calculator.

How much will my loan my repayments be ?

Whether you’re buying your first home, investing or refinancing, our Borrowing Power Calculator helps you plan and budget for your new home loan, refinancing loan or investment loan.

Follow the steps to quickly see how much you can borrow :

Use this easy calculator to work out how much Stamp Duty your new home will incur at varied prices.

01. household turnover
Enter your household income
and regular expenses
02. loan interest
& period
Specify a loan interest rate and over what period of time ( loan term ) you’ll pay off the loan
03. loan capacity scenarios
Adjust any of these measures and see straight away what your borrowing capacity will be for varied scenarios
04. create
For example, see the difference in your borrowing capacity if you pay your loan over 25 years or over 30 years

Tim is currently leading Geon Property’s largest project – the mixed-use, $750m Transit Oriented Development at Albion, Brisbane. His contribution to the Geon Property team is highly valued amongst teams members and shareholders alike, with his strong work ethic ensuring projects gain momentum. Tim’s passion and dedication to health and fitness are paramount to his success in facilitating his work-life balance. His competitive spirit resonates well with intra-office sporting challenges.
